column5: Just thought I'd say hello.... glad to see a lot of familiar faces still remain.  Just thought I would give a quick shout out to those  still sorta in my circle and let them know I'm still verticle
Long time no hear.  Hope you are doing well.
Nice to hear from you Gerritt! HH
Hah ... must be something in the water ... I just checked back in after YEARS ! ... nice to see familiar faces !
Hello G.  Hope all is well.  Were still afloat here.
Wow Camilij And Gerrit good to see you both.   Art

All is great here... and yeah it's been a couple of years I'd  reckon since the last ti.e I have logged on here .. life, job, kids in not particular order. Glad to see everything/everyone is ok here as well!  G
